text: Mask of the Dragon is a 1951 American film directed by Sam Newfield for Lippert Pictures. Part of it was set in a television studio, which was novel at the time. ==Cast== *Richard Travis as Phil Ramsey *Sheila Ryan as Ginny O'Donnell *Sid Melton as Manchu Murphy *Michael Whalen as Maj. Clinton *Lyle Talbot as Lt. "Mack" McLaughlin ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1951 films Category:1950s thriller films Category:American films Category:American thriller films Category:English-language films Category:Lippert Pictures films Category:Films directed by Sam Newfield
title: Mask of the Dragon
